subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Kei Igawa retired all six hitters he faced in the Yankees’ 2-0 victory on Tuesday, throwing his first three pitches for balls and then 14 of his last 16 for strikes.
snippet: Kei Igawa retired all six hitters he faced in the Yankees’ 2-0 victory on Tuesday, throwing his first three pitches for balls and then 14 of his last 16 for strikes.
